To predict a development index value please fill in the form below with required fields. Each time a new value is predicted - it is also being added to database and both machine learning models are retrained. This project has two models:
K-Nearest-Neighbor model with inital accuracy of 86%
Random Forest model with initial accuracy of 91%
Below, when predicting values, the accuracy changes dramatically if random values are entered. Try it out!
